pages.text: With your Bucket of Nature Essence ready, you can begin brewing specialized coatings for your weapons using the Essence Coating Ritual.

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: Step 1: Fill a Cauldron with the Bucket of Nature Essence obtained from the nature ritual.$(br)Step 2: Add the required ingredients into the cauldron according to the coating recipe.$(br)Step 3: Once the correct items are added right click with a Hex Focus, the cauldron will show purple particles and after a short duration it will create the corresponding Essence Coating Bottle.

pages.title: Coating Recipes
pages.text: Each Essence Coating requires a unique set of items.$(br)Each recpie will include Mandrake and Rustic Bottle by default.

pages.title: Coating Use
pages.text: Hold the Essence Coating Bottle in the Off-Hand and the desired weapon to infuse it with in your Main-Hand then right click and the bottle content will be infused with the weapon.

pages.title: Prepare the Cauldron
pages.text: Make sure to always have a cauldron ready and placed in a safe area for your rituals.
